about.title: About me
about.primary: Hey, there! I'm Hunter. I am just a guy from Clarkston, Washington. That's my beautiful wife with me. We are both studying at BYU - I'm finishing up my Computer Science degree. I am passionate about building things and learning new software technologies.
about.secondary: When I'm not locked in my office coding, you'll probably catch me watching football, shooting hoops, or at the gym. I'm all about a good book, hiking, and traveling to new places.

projects.title: Apollo Planning
projects.description: A web application that allows users to create and share their own personal goals and plans. Built using Vue.js, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB.

projects.title: Path-finding Algorithm Visualizer
projects.description: Visualize some of the most common pathfinding algorithms including A* Search, Dijkstra, Greedy Best First Search, etc. Static generated site built in React

projects.title: Family Map Server
projects.description: Http server built from scratch using Java. The endpoints are for generating and manipulating information in a Family Map Client android application which can also be viewed on my Github.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Want to connect? Feel free to reach out to me through any of the social links below or send me a message using the form.
